definitions.definition: The gases surrounding the Earth or any astronomical body.
The air in a particular place.
The conditions (such as music, illumination etc.) that can influence the mood felt in an environment .
The apparent mood felt in an environment .
examples: The atmosphere for the football match was great.

definitions.definition: A unit of measurement for pressure equal to 101325 Pa (symbol: atm ), approximately the atmospheric pressure at sea level .
Extras in a scene who have no spoken lines.

main_definition: The gases surrounding the Earth or any astronomical body.
secondary_definitions: The air in a particular place.
( figuratively ) The conditions (such as music, illumination etc.) that can influence the mood felt in an environment .
( figuratively ) The apparent mood felt in an environment .
A unit of measurement for pressure equal to 101325 Pa (symbol: atm ), approximately the atmospheric pressure at sea level .
( television , film , uncountable ) Extras in a scene who have no spoken lines.
